title: ===========2bed/1ba unit in South Loop available for rent - NOW
posting_body: **************New CARPET, Newly Painted, Brand New Refrigerator, On Michigan Ave, New APPLIANCES, Walk able distance to Lake, Nice Downtown and Lake Michigan View from Bedroom.
For the unit, it's east facing, usable balcony space, 5-burner Gas range, brand new refrigerator.
A two bed one bath Condo is available for rent in River North.
It is newly painted and has all modern appliances and equipment.
It has excellent Lake Michigan View located in heart of downtown you can find tons of restaurants, most famous bars/clubs of chicago, and L & Bus Stop a block away.
contact: 224 - five three two, three eight seven zero.
Rent Includes -Water, Gas, Cable TV, Internet.
Granite Counter top - In unit washer and dryer - Double sink in Bath - Hardwood floor.
- Carpeted bed room - Open Balcony - In unit washer and dryer - Cable and Internet read.
Close to Grant/Millennium Parks, Merchandise Mart, Museums, shopping, museum, dining,lake,downtown, CTA EL Red line a block away.

This place is very close to downtown, loop, river north, Gold coast, south side, south loop, north side, uptown, buck town, Lake View, Lincoln park, Lincoln Square, Logan Square, Rogers Park, Bucktown, North Center, West Redige, Streeterville, South loop, Bridge port, and Hyde park, west loop, loop, south loop.
